name: OCKGridTaskViewController
desc: A view controller that displays multiple events in a grid collection view.

items.name: init(task: OCKAnyTask, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a view controller, with a specific task.

items.name: init(taskID: String, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a view controller, with a task identifier.

items.name: init(taskIDs: [String], eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a view controller, with a an array of task identifiers.

items.name: init(viewSynchronizer: OCKGridTaskViewSynchronizer, task: OCKAnyTask, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new task view controller with a specific synchronizer, task, and query.

items.name: init(viewSynchronizer: OCKGridTaskViewSynchronizer, taskID: String, eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new task view controller with a specific synchronizer, task identifier, and query.

items.name: init(viewSynchronizer: OCKGridTaskViewSynchronizer, taskIDs: [String], eventQuery: OCKEventQuery, storeManager: OCKSynchronizedStoreManager)
items.desc: Creates a new task view controller with a specific synchronizer, array of task identifier, and query.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, cellForItemAt: IndexPath) -> UICollectionViewCell
items.desc: Returns the visible cell object at the specified index path.

items.name: func collectionView(UICollectionView, numberOfItemsInSection: Int) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of items in a specific section of the collection view.

items.name: func numberOfSections(in: UICollectionView) -> Int
items.desc: Returns the number of sections in a collection view.
